data.title: Susan Saint James
data.text:
AKA Susan Jane Miller

Born: 14-Aug-1946

Birthplace: Long Beach, CA

Gender: Female

Religion: Roman Catholic

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Wife in McMillan and Wife

Father: (chemist)

Husband: Dick Ebersol (husband #3, producer of SNL, m. 1981)

Son: Harmony Lucas

Daughter: Sunshine Lucas

Son: Edward Ebersol (d. 2004 airplane crash)

Son: Charles Ebersol

Son: William Ebersol

University: Connecticut College for Women (dropped out after one week)

Al Franken for Senate

Friends of Hillary

Hillary Clinton for President

Hillary Rodham Clinton for US Senate Committee

John McCain 2008

Wedding: Arnold Schwarzenegger and Maria Shriver (1986)

Risk Factors: Vegetarian

McMillan and Wife Sally McMillan (wife, 1971-76)

Kate & Allie Kate McArdle (1984-89)
